website_summaries.verdict: Absence of headphone jack aside, the 7 Plus is the best iPhone you can buy, with more memory than its smaller counterpart and dual cameras that peer toward Apple's future.
pros: Faster on all performance measures, with better battery life, than last year's iPhones
iOS still leads on high-quality games and creative apps
cons: Lacks a 3.5mm jack, and there aren't a lot of Lightning-compatible headphones yet
Not all models are compatible with all carriers

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 7 Plus. It didn’t mention anything about reconditioned in the advert.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a new iPhone 7 Plus for the money paid. I didn’t receive a plug and charging cable or headphones although there were gaps in the box for them. The box itself was stuck with sellotape. Very disappointed indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Phone works great, a little more damage that I wanted (ding on top outer), but fine as I use a case. The screen isn’t a genuine apple display, so my Apple Pay doesn’t work, annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Jersey

customer_reviews.title: All present and correct, 100% Apple! 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the phone on Sunday, arrived today (Tuesday). Everything is present and correct (hope the images help). All appears perfectly legit and I had NO ISSUES setting it up. Side note: after doing an analysis of the prices and the Apple iPhone range the iPhone 7 is definitely the best VALUE FOR MONEY. Which one you choose is up to you! 5 Stars and have already recommended it to people!
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Brand new !!!
customer_reviews.text: Brand new black iPhone 7 Plus in sealed apple box with all accessories. 1yr apple warranty £100 cheaper than apple site Just the job thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone. Invaluable seller. Unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.text: Found an excellent phone for an unbeatable price from this awesome seller. Very happy with service: seller made sure I knew what I was buying before shipping the item. No issues at all after 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Please provide a pen name.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with my new iPhone 7 Plus! The battery is amazing and do we want to talk about the dual camera??? Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Slim and gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: The iphone arrived ahead of time and everything was as I had hoped. It was bigger than I thought as I thought it was the same size as the 6S but I love it. I was able to transfer all my information and data within 5 minutes. The display is bright and clear and the battery life is much better than my old phone. It also takes great photos. I was also pleased to find that the enclosed headphones fit in the charger port as I wanted to use regular headphones. Overall I am delighted with my new phone. Fiona Leahy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Awful ignored my complaints. The phone I bought had a dodger speaker which you wouldn’t be able to tell at first. It would mean all phone calls FaceTimes and everything would have to be made using headphones. Even then the phone it’s self would end up breaking the headphones due to this. Extremely disappointed no longer am I buying phones from amazon the manufacturers website it is for me. :(
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my wife and I have only marked it down on easy to use as none of the contacts or photo's transferred from the old phone despite following the instructions and will take a visit to the Apple Store - Well over=priced but hey its Apple not exactly breaking news. Screen is excellent and although we know fragile from our daughters mishaps with hers but overall a decent phone.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Collins

customer_reviews.title: Virtually unusable after 12 months
customer_reviews.text: Apps no longer open. Performance is terrible. Plenty of spare memory, but phone is now useless. I may have to abandon iPhones from now on. iPhone 7 Plus was brand new when supplied by Amazon. I presume iOS 13.3.1 or the iPhone’s internals are to blame. It’s pretty shocking from Apple!
customer_reviews.author: Justice Peace

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade from iPhone 5...
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone 5 was on its way out, to the point I could hardly open it (which wasn’t the safest option for me being a student living away from home in a big city). Invested in this phone as a quick option, and it’s proven great so far - more storage and bigger screen.
customer_reviews.author: haz00mc3

customer_reviews.title: Iphone quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Now an older model whose functions are fine unless you need the latest cameras. Enables you to have a sim only contract to avoid large monthly bills. As all Iphones the battery life if used a lot is disappointing. A worthwhile buy nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a scam
customer_reviews.text: Trying to make a complaint here. The iPhone 7 Plus I bought from this supplier is not new and is either not the real thing or is a scam. The female lightning charging receiver on the phone does not fit the male wire receiver supplied with it. I bought this in September to give to my husband for Christmas only to find out that it’s a fake.
customer_reviews.author: C M Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Love it ... great price n delivery
customer_reviews.text: Good value ... delivered next day . Got stuck with set up , but quick visit to Apple shop for help n up n running Gold is Lovely .... love the big screen . Another bargain from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Even if its an old model, still worthed!
customer_reviews.text: Ive always been an android fan and decided to try ios system so I decided to start with this model of phone, iphone 7 plus, because the 8th plus has glass case. 2 months of use and the phone is amazing, battery life keeps me full day with facebook, watsapp and some youtube heavy usage.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Genuine New phone (Sold By Amazon)
customer_reviews.text: Great Genuine phone Brand new (Sold By Amazon) unlike some phones sold on the internet; which are sold as New sealed phones, but in fact used/reconditioned and re-sealed in the box.
customer_reviews.author: ANDY ZM.

customer_reviews.title: My best ever phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and great spec, wether you want to take photos, videos, play games or just have boring phone calls. Big enough to be like a mini tablet, but not big enough to be a burden.
customer_reviews.author: Mr B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product

customer_reviews.title: Amazing condition , just as if it was bought from the Apple store
customer_reviews.text: I like that it came in beautiful conditions as if it was bought from the apple store. It was very easy to use and I've haven't done across any glitches which is very good. I would definitely recommend purchasing from here again as it is good value for your money.

It’s a big leap from my 5s so it’s going to take a while to learn all the ins and outs! Overall very happy with a great phone.
